Microsoft Research India has selected the pink city Jaipur, the capital of Rajasthan States of India for this year’s 9th annual research symposium Tech Event called Microsoft TechVista 2014.

It was filled with Global Research Leaders. Tech Vista offers a great chance for the Government, universal research community and students to interrelate and share innovative ideas on research and its upcoming routes.

Here assembled the first-rate computing researchers, governmental leaders, and talented academics. It was a most excellent platform to work together and swap over ideas while conversing about the function of Computer Science in the year 2014.
